mapper.insert: insert into sns_account (user_id, type, account, account_user_name, is_validated, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValidated,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update sns_account set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_user_name = #{accountUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_validated = #{isValidated,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, type, account, account_user_name, is_validated, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag from sns_account where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and del_flag='0'
select id, user_id, type, account, account_user_name, is_validated, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag from sns_account where del_flag='0'
